channel.title: C++ help, really stuck
channel.description:
Needed to hide the process of GunZ from injectors and trainers But the program needs the process id of GunZ itself So to hide and block haxckers
I want to hide gunz from the injectors Or from any other sort of interference of third party programs
http://filebeam.com/6806129a5ad7af5663a39e40829824c5
Need this ASAP.

item.title: C++ help, really stuck
item.dc:creator: @qauters qauters
item.description:
@qauters wrote:

Even if you manged to hide it, it wonâ€™t help.

GunZ has a window, which means:

DWORD PID; //process ID
HWND hwnd = WindowFromPoint(p); //p would be located on Gunz window ofcourse
GetWindowThreadProcessId(hwnd, &PID); //return vaue is Thread ID

Read full topic
